a) I can not see any traces of mani, wazi etc. in my wear
b) I go to the bathroom and squeeze my sexual organ to ensure that really no liquid is stuck it

Then, at the moment of squeezing there is often a single drop of liquid (I think it is wazi) which comes out.

Question 1:
In the above-mentioned situation, will I have to do ghusl if I saw no erotic dream?

Question 2:
In the above-mentioned situation, will I have to do ghusl if I actually saw an erotic dream?

Question 3:
Would it be ok for me to simply stop squeezing every morning and just going to toilet and ignoring this single drop? (This question applies to both cases: erotic dream and no erotic dream)
